## About

Yizhou Ben Ma is a PhD researcher at [Wageningen University & Research (WUR)](https://wur.eu) currently working on the adaptive control of 3D food printing. His research focuses on the interface between digitization and food science. He is interested in developing digital solutions to food problems in product development, manufacturing, and consumer insights. Prior to his PhD research, Yizhou worked as a senior R&D scientist at [Gastrograph AI](https://gastrograph.com), where he developed predictive sensory analytics using natural language processing and machine learning models.
